entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:29 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
